summary: AN ORDINANCE amending Sections 25.28.220 and 25.28.230.B of the Seattle Municipal Code (Sections 1.03 and 3.02 of Ordinance 107323) to reinstate and revise the geographic area for minimum maintenance of historic buildings in Pioneer Square which was inadvertently eliminated by the repeal of Sections 25.28.010 - 25.28.150 of the Seattle Municipal Code (Ordinance 98852, as amended), and to eliminate the Burlington Northern tunnel from the definition of the word "building".
